results.content: some good details to broaden your knowledge with, but I expected I would learn spring boot related concepts that will stick. Feels like after watching the course, after a day, I will remember nothing
results.content_html: some good details to broaden your knowledge with, but I expected I would learn spring boot related concepts that will stick. Feels like after watching the course, after a day, I will remember nothing

results.content:
Fast paced information in each video. Sometimes faster than human eye can see (so pausing video helps if needed). Information are all useful and provided in practical manner. Sometimes I miss some clue between topics and I miss some logical order. That does not lower the value of information.
I like fast peace of information coming from video. I would expect a bit more structure of topic, but first and last slide of each video is perfectly summarizing things, so I have not lost clue.
A bit problem I see, that this is second part of course and I was not aware of this before enrolling to course. With required knowledge (I am missing any spring mvc knowledge) it should not be problem at all.
I would appreciate a bit deeper dive into testing with some theory of what type of testing approaches are supported by spring and other "glue" info.

results.content: The instructor is discussing some advanced and complex topic but he is not taking into consideration that this might be difficult to understand and speaks fast , also there is not sufficient examples so far to see how exactly these work and in what situation i'd need to use them

results.content: Very good short training to learn some advance Spring topics, I advice it strongly!
